creditline: Gift of funds from Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: pair of plates, copper with Peking enamel, wide flanged borders painted in lavendar with four shaped panels of flowers and fruits reserved in lemon yellow and four small medallions of stylized dragons in black and white; the central motif is flowers with a pair of butterflies on white background; the images on each plate mirror one another.
title: Plate, one of a pair
